snippet.title: Paint Defense - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Paint Defense is a color-based tower defense game where you have to micromanage a constantly evolving battlefield.

In this twist on the tower defense genre, tower choice and positioning matters more than ever! Certain enemies can only be damaged by certain towers, leading to a unique gameplay style with fast paced buying and selling strategy.

Get it now at https://winterdrake.itch.io/paint-defense
